name: Crown of the Primus
flavorText: The Peace Warder Radaugh was a singular being who had the powers of time itself at his command. Unfortunately, this frequently left him in a befuddled state, allowing the upstart cultist Vess to kill him and take the prized Crown of the Primus for his own.
flavorTextHtml: The Peace Warder Radaugh was a singular being who had the powers of time itself at his command. Unfortunately, this frequently left him in a befuddled state, allowing the upstart cultist Vess to kill him and take the prized Crown of the Primus for his own.

secondary.textHtml: Slow Time gains the effect of every rune. (Wizard Only)
secondary.text: Slow Time gains the effect of every rune. (Wizard Only)
